Category: Toners/Astringents
book: 2515-Druide Face Toner, Chamomile and Rice Protein (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Matricaria Recutita (Chamomille) Extract*, Glycerin, Aspalathus Lineris (Rooibos) Extract*, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract*, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Galactoarabinan, Levulinic Acid, Sodium Carboxymethyl Cellulose, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Hydroxyde, Sodium Benzoate.
book: 2515-Druide Face Toner, Chamomile and Rice Protein (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: After cleansing the skin, apply a small amount of lotion on a pad and apply to the face, neck and d collet area.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
